tool_description: API to retrieve news articles from the BBC
name: BBC News Live
title: BBC News Live

api_list.name: Get Sepecific Article
api_list.description: Get Sepecific Article  usine Article ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bbc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/article/business-59076532"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bbc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/article/{article_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
